Name: The Ball Flow - First Approach
About the game: Thank you for visit my store! I'm an indie alone developer. The game could isn't enough to you, But I wish this game make your feeling better. Major game Feature Roll the ball and explore beautiful world. You can see the lot of trees , flowers and bushes. Change the Material for move through. You can choose three balls. First, Wooden ball. It can use generous situation for avoid obstacle. Second, Rock ball. It will defend damage from moving. Last, Magic ball. This allow you to move faster and float in atmosphere . Find your own way to goal. This three Ball is essential to explore world and find a way to goal.
